# Launch Day Checklist

## Code & Package
- [x] v1.0.0 tagged on GitHub
- [x] Published to PyPI
- [x] pip install frameworm works
- [x] Docs live on GitHub Pages

## Communities (post in this order)
- [ ] Reddit r/MachineLearning
- [ ] Reddit r/Python
- [ ] Hacker News "Show HN"
- [ ] Product Hunt
- [ ] Twitter/X thread
- [ ] LinkedIn post
- [ ] Discord (ML communities)

## Post Templates (use LAUNCH_ASSETS/)
- product_hunt_post.md
- twitter_thread.md
- reddit_post.md

## Engagement
- [ ] Reply to all comments within 24h
- [ ] Answer questions on GitHub Discussions
- [ ] Pin launch tweet
- [ ] Add to awesome-pytorch list
